contest-event.event-date:
June 29, 1895 D Long Eaton Contest
Long Eaton Contest 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Long Eaton Contest long-eaton-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Lohengrin [arr. Round]
Long Eaton, Derbyshire Prizes: £13 10s, £9, £5, £2 10s
11 bands entered.
Derby United Prize Band subsequently lost a court case for damages against the Long Eaton Friendly Society following their disqualification for failing to attend and lead the parade before the contest.
April 15, 2012, 9:15 p.m. Nov. 29, 2013, 9:06 p.m.
